item.title: Stocktwits Acquires AI Startup Thematic to Power Social Investment Research in the AI Era
item.description: Industry-leading platform furthers its AI technology to activate years of community insights and proprietary data.

item.title: Alphabet’s Waymo Expands Robotaxi Coverage In Austin As Competition With Elon Musk-Led Tesla Heats Up
item.description: Waymo is now serving a larger area in Austin, more than doubling the serviceable region after Tesla launched a competing robotaxi service in June.

item.title: Lawrence Summers Warns Trump’s Push For Deep Fed Rate Cuts Risks ‘Massive Inflation Psychology’
item.description: The former Treasury Secretary told Bloomberg that no mainstream economist supports “anything like 1% rates” in the current environment.

item.title: Veritone’s AI Solutions Land Spot On DoD’s Elite Procurement List: Retail Chatter Explodes 800% In 24 Hours
item.description: The recognition enables Veritone to provide its AI-powered products directly to U.S. defense agencies through a simplified purchasing system called P1...
